Bio: Apache Viking – a band fuelled out of love in Newcastle – between citizens of USA & Northumbria – following previous life tours of this world and friendships locked and forged years ago– Free Diamonds / Foresake Ya To The Snakes / The Devitos - three champs return to the ring to fight again – with two guitars & drums & three voices chanting, screaming, harmonising – garage lofi rock – new songs new songs new songs prolific and quick – weddings had/children born – no back seats – new best friends – 2009 – Hussy Hussy Records - like a family – Brit electric mania and yankee twist - the wheels of the recording studio get rolling and capture the sound X2 – shows come, friends blaze – BBC – future sounds of UK – French beckon – countryside – more songs songs songs – east city punk blues – expansion – what else do you want to know that would benefit? BBC6 Music bands to watch for 2010: "Newcastle band Apache Viking. Definately. They are one of the best post punk outfits around - so exciting".
